title: At SC17: Silicon, Systems and Science – the Good News and the Bad
author: Doug Black
text: We interviewed Karl Freund, lead analyst for deep learning and HPC at Moor Insights & Strategy, at SC17 in Denver to discuss the fertile crossover between AI and HPC – specifically, how new machine learning techniques are rapidly evolving to take on previously unsolvable business and scientific problems. He also reviewed major new developments spanning, in his words, "silicon, systems and science," including good and bad news regarding ARM, AMD, Intel and Nvidia.Here's a link to interview.
